Introduction

RuViChe (formerly known as MSG) is a South Korean trot girl group under S-Media Solution Entertainment. The group consists of racing models Hanvi, Minso, Jiwon, and Sua. They debuted on March 23, 2023, with the digital single “배달의 민수 (Minsu of Delivery)”.
